name: projects/1017425675889/locations/europe-west3/instances/a099fd02-80fc-4a0f-a80c-fb5d7fe78564/rules/ru_343c717c-28a2-4e71-9f53-88a2a434e488
text:
rule ursnif_malware_dns {

  meta:
    author = "Google Cloud Security"
    description = "Detects when a series of events occur that align with the ursnif/ldr4 malware"
    reference = "https://thedfirreport.com/2023/01/09/unwrapping-ursnifs-gifts/"
    platform = "Windows"
    type = "alert"
    data_source = "crowdstrike"
    severity = "High"
    priority = "High"

  events:
    $dns.metadata.event_type = "NETWORK_DNS"
    $dns.metadata.vendor_name = "Crowdstrike"
    $dns.metadata.product_event_type = "SuspiciousDnsRequest"
    //$dns.principal.process.command_line = /\.com/ nocase
    $dns.principal.hostname = $hostname
    $dns.network.dns.questions.name = $dns_query

    $dns.metadata.event_timestamp.seconds < $net.metadata.event_timestamp.seconds

    $net.metadata.event_type = "NETWORK_CONNECTION"
    $net.metadata.vendor_name = "Crowdstrike"
    $net.network.direction = "OUTBOUND"
    $net.network.ip_protocol = "TCP"
    $net.target.port = 80
    $net.target.ip in %ursnif_Ip_addresses
    $net.principal.hostname = $hostname

  match:
    $hostname over 15m

  outcome:
    $risk_score = 85

  condition:
    $dns and $net
}
author: Google Cloud Security

metadata.description: Detects when a series of events occur that align with the ursnif/ldr4 malware
